Detailed Description

Class for decoding PNG images.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::Attach (  const BinData &  data  ) 
 

Attaches the data stream data to the decoder. If data is in PNG format then basic image metrics information is read and stored and can be interrogated on successful return. This method is intended to pre-analyze data and extract basic image metrics information prior to decoding the image. On successful return one can use the methods given in the see-clause to get image metrics information.

See also:
GetWidth()

GetHeight()

IsInterlaced()

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::BeginDecoding (  const BinData &  data  ) 
 

Calls Attach() and initializes the decoding process. After this method has been called the decoder can be asked if the image uses transparency.

See also:
TransparentMode()

void PngDecoder::CleanUp (   )  [protected]
 

Frees memory and resets member variables.

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::DecodeNextScanline (   ) 
 

Decodes one scanline and writes it into the internal scanline buffer m_scanline.

void PngDecoder::EndDecoding (   ) 
 

Ends decoding by cleaning up dynamic memory.

void PngDecoder::FreePng (   )  [protected]
 

Frees libpng structures.

INT PngDecoder::GetHeight (   )  const
 

Returns the height of the image. Valid only after successful attach.

See also:
Attach()

PngDecoder * PngDecoder::GetInstance (   )  [static]
 

Returns the singleton instance of the PNG decoder. The instance is protected using a semaphore.

PngDecoder::Error PngDecoder::GetLastError (   )  const
 

Worker methods of this class return TRUE on success and FALSE on failure of their work. In case of failure this method can be called to get more information on the problem encountered.

void PngDecoder::GetNextPixelColor (  UINT8 &  red,
UINT8 &  green,
UINT8 &  blue,
UINT8 &  alpha
) 
 

Retrieves the color of the next pixel in Rgba format. If it is a fully transparent pixel, either simple or alpha channel transparency, then FALSE is returned signalling that nothing should be drawn. Background color information provided in the image is ignored, the preferred method is to use the client background instead.

Color PngDecoder::GetTransparentColor (   )  const
 

Returns the transparent color. This is only valid if IsTransparent() is TRUE.

INT PngDecoder::GetWidth (   )  const
 

Returns the width of the image. Valid only after successful attach.

See also:
Attach()

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::HasNativeAlphaChannel (   )  const
 

Tells if the native image data (image data before any transformation) provides alpha channel information. Valid only after successful begin of decoding.

See also:
BeginDecoding()

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::InitDecoderLib (   )  [protected]
 

Allocates libpng structures and reads the PNG image header.

void PngDecoder::InitPixelColorAccess (  INT  scanline_idx = 0  ) 
 

Initializes sequential access to the decoded pixel colors currently residing in the scanline buffer m_scanline. The color information can be read pixel-wise using method GetNextPixelColor() starting at index scanline_idx.

Parameters:
scanline_idx Index where to start reading the pixels of the currently decoded scanline.
See also:
GetNextPixelColor()

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::IsInterlaced (   )  const
 

Tells if the image is to be drawn in interlaced mode. Valid only after successful attach.

See also:
Attach()

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::IsPng (  const BinData &  data  )  [static]
 

Determines if the data stream data starts like a valid PNG image data stream.

BOOLEAN PngDecoder::IsTransparent (   )  const
 

Tells if the image is to be drawn in transparent mode. Valid only after successful begin of decoding.

See also:
BeginDecoding()

void PngDecoder::PngLibraryFreeFunction (  png_structp  png_struct,
png_voidp  ptr
)  [static, protected]
 

Free function needed by libpng to free from dedicated memory pool.

png_voidp PngDecoder::PngLibraryMallocFunction (  png_structp  png_struct,
png_size_t  size
)  [static, protected]
 

Malloc function needed by libpng to use only dedicated memory pool.

void PngDecoder::PngLibraryReadFunction (  png_structp  png_struct,
png_bytep  data,
png_size_t  length
)  [static, protected]
 

Read function needed by libpng for reading from data stream.

void PngDecoder::ReleaseInstance (   ) 
 

Releases the PNG decoder, i.e. the semaphore is released and the singleton instance is deleted.

void PngDecoder::SetErr (  Error  code,
BOOLEAN  cleanup = TRUE
)  [protected]
 

Sets error code and optionally performs a cleanup.
